SELECT t.id, t.title, t.code, t.pid, t.path, t.sort, t.grade from sys_menu t where t.state = true and exists ( select 1 from sys_role_menu s, sys_user_role o where s.role_id = o.role_id and t.id = s.menu_id and o.user_id = #{userId})
and t.grade = #{grade}

SELECT t.id, t.title, t.code, t.pid, t.path, t.sort, t.grade from sys_menu t where t.state = true and (t.display_state & 2) = 2
and t.grade = #{grade}

SELECT t.id, t.title, t.code, t.pid, t.path, t.sort, t.grade from sys_menu t where t.state = true and (t.display_state & 1) = 1
and t.grade = #{grade}
SELECT t.id, t.title, t.code, t.pid, t.path, t.sub_path, t.sort, t.grade from sys_menu t where t.state = true
select id from sys_menu where pid = #{pid} and state = true order by id desc limit 1
